body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Kings. My name is Richard Evans, how can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Richard, I'm Carolyn Butler. I'm looking for information on your latest car models.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Carolyn. Could you please provide me with your contact number so I can follow up with more details?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's eight six seven five five five zero nine three two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, I have noted your number. Can I also have your email address for further communication?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is carolyn.butler@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Carolyn. We'll reach out to you shortly with the requested information.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Richard. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Carolyn. If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. Have a great day!
